mapper.select:
SELECT ctgry_no, up_ctgry_no, ctgry_nm, ctgry_dpth, actvtn_yn, reg_dt FROM product_categories
ORDER BY reg_dt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_categories (ctgry_no, ctgry_nm, up_ctgry_no, ctgry_dpth, creatr_no, actvtn_yn) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{categoryName}, #{parentCategoryId}, #{categoryLevel}, #{userNo}, #{activationYn})

if.test: searchKey != null and searchValue != null and searchValue != ''

choose.when: AND (ctgry_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR ctgry_no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%'))

mapper.select: SELECT ctgry_no, up_ctgry_no, creatr_no, ctgry_nm, ctgry_dpth, reg_dt, actvtn_yn FROM ks55team02db.product_categories WHERE ctgry_no = #{categoryId} AND actvtn_yn = TRUE;
SELECT ctgry_no, up_ctgry_no, creatr_no, ctgry_nm, ctgry_dpth, reg_dt, actvtn_yn FROM ks55team02db.product_categories WHERE up_ctgry_no = #{parentCategoryId} AND actvtn_yn = TRUE ORDER BY ctgry_nm;
SELECT ctgry_no, up_ctgry_no, creatr_no, ctgry_nm, ctgry_dpth, reg_dt, actvtn_yn FROM ks55team02db.product_categories WHERE up_ctgry_no IS NULL AND actvtn_yn = TRUE ORDER BY ctgry_nm;
SELECT ctgry_no FROM ks55team02db.product_categories WHERE ctgry_nm = #{categoryName} AND up_ctgry_no IS NULL AND actvtn_yn = TRUE LIMIT 1;
SELECT ctgry_no, up_ctgry_no, creatr_no, ctgry_nm, ctgry_dpth, reg_dt, actvtn_yn FROM ks55team02db.product_categories WHERE actvtn_yn = TRUE ORDER BY ctgry_nm;
